### With `;`

```
FROM ubuntu:18.04

RUN ls bar; echo foo
```

gives:

```
Step 1/2 : FROM ubuntu:18.04
 ---> 3339fde08fc3
Step 2/2 : RUN ls bar; echo foo
 ---> Running in 241a576653e5
ls: cannot access 'bar': No such file or directory
foo
Removing intermediate container 241a576653e5
 ---> b150b4436365
Successfully built b150b4436365
Successfully tagged 4561:latest
```

### With &&

```
FROM ubuntu:18.04

RUN ls bar && echo foo
```

gives:

```
Step 1/2 : FROM ubuntu:18.04
 ---> 3339fde08fc3
Step 2/2 : RUN ls bar && echo foo
 ---> Running in 52adab72f0e9
ls: cannot access 'bar': No such file or directory
The command '/bin/sh -c ls bar && echo foo' returned a non-zero code: 2
```
